content: अगोचर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Imperceptible by the senses, not obvious, See गोचर; वाचामगोचरां हर्षावस्थामस्पृशत् <ls>Dk. 169</ls> beyond the power of words, indescribable. --रं {@--1@} Anything beyond the cognizance of the senses. {@--2@} Not being seen or observed, or known; कथं देवपादानामगोचरेणैवं क्रियते <ls>H. 2</ls> without the knowledge of; °तां गतान् <ls>Pt. 2.</ls> {@--3@} Brahma; अगोचरे वागिव चोपरेमे <ls>Ki. 17. 11.</ls>
